required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Degranulation Needle With Different Diameters on the Rate Good Embryo in IVF
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Degranulation Needle on the Rate Good Embryo in IVF

brief_summary.textblock: Good-quality embryos are critical for the success of in vitro fertilization (IVF). But, to date, there is no report of the effect of different diameters denuding pipette on the embryos quality. To investigate the effect of denuding pipette in IVF outcomes, we plan to recruit women undergoing IVF treatment cycles and classified them into two groups according to the different diameters. Consequently, the rate of fertilization, zygotes cleaved, top quality embryos on D3, and blastocysts obtained were recorded.

detailed_description.textblock: Good-quality embryos are critical for the success of in vitro fertilization (IVF). But, to date, there is no report of the effect of different diameters denuding pipette on the embryos quality. To investigate the effect of denuding pipette in IVF outcomes, we plan to recruit women undergoing IVF treatment cycles and classified them into two groups according to the different diameters. The participants were divided into two group. Odd-numbered days the zygotes were degranulated with the 140 microns needles. Even-numbered days the zygotes were degranulated with the 150 microns needles. Consequently, the rate of fertilization, zygotes cleaved, top quality embryos on D3, and blastocysts obtained were recorded.

primary_outcome.description: embryo quality assessed by good embryo rate

arm_group.description: Once odd-numbered days the zytoges of IVF cycle were collected. The 140 microns denuding pipette was used.
Once even-numbered days the zytoges of IVF cycle were collected. The 150 microns denuding pipette was used.

intervention.description: the degranulated needle size was 140 microns
the degranulated needle size was 150 microns

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- first cyele of IVF treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- oocyte number less than 4
- oocyte number over than 25
